    Master Student
    Mathematics
    National Taiwan University

    Greek Letters

    Output Code Output Code Output Code Output Code
    \alpha \theta o \tau
    \beta \vartheta \pi \upsilon
    \gamma \xi \varpi \phi
    \delta \kappa \rho \varphi
    \epsilon \lambda \varrho \chi
    \varepsilon \mu \sigma \psi
    \zeta \nu \varsigma \omega
    \eta      
    \Gamma \Lambda \Sigma \Psi
    \Delta \Xi \Upsilon \Omega
    \Theta \Pi \Phi  

    Binary Operation Symbols

    Output Code Output Code Output Code Output Code
    \pm \cap \diamond \oplus
    \mp \cup \bigtriangleup \ominus
    \times \uplus \bigtriangledown \otimes
    \div \sqcap \triangleleft \oslash
    \ast \sqcup \triangleright \odot
    \star \vee \lhd \bigcirc
    \circ \wedge \rhd \dagger
    \bullet \setminus \unlhd \ddagger
    \cdot \wr \unrhd \smalg
    + -    

    Relation Symbols

    Output Code Output Code Output Code Output Code
    \leq \geq \equiv \models
    \prec \succ \sim \perp
    \preceq \succeq \simeq \mid
    \ll \gg \asymp \parallel
    \subset \supset \approx \bowtie
    \subseteq \supseteq \cong \Join
    \sqsubset \sqsupset \neq \smile
    \sqsubseteq \sqsupseteq \doteq \frown
    \in \ni \propto =
    \vdash \dashv < >
    :      

    Punctuation Symbols

    Output Code Output Code Output Code Output Code Output Code
    , ; \colon \ldotp \cdotp

    Arrow Symbols

    Output Code Output Code Output Code
    \leftarrow \longleftarrow \uparrow
    \Leftarrow \Longleftarrow \Uparrow
    \rightarrow \longrightarrow \downarrow
    \Rightarrow \Longrightarrow \Downarrow
    \leftrightarrow \longleftrightarrow \updownarrow
    \Leftrightarrow \Longleftrightarrow \Updownarrow
    \mapsto \longmapsto \nearrow
    \hookleftarrow \hookrightarrow \searrow
    \leftharpoonup \rightharpoonup \swarrow
    \leftharpoondown \rightharpoondown \nwarrow
    \rightleftharpoons \leadsto  

    Miscellaneous Symbols

    Output Code Output Code Output Code Output Code
    \ldots \cdots \vdots \ddots

    \hbar \emptyset \exists \Box
    \imath \nabla \neg \Diamond
    \jmath \surd \flat \triangle
    \ell \top \natural \clusuit
    \wp \bot \sharp \diamondsuit
    \Re | \backslash \heartsuit
    \Im \angle \partial \spadesuit
    \mho .
